description:
Reliable tubeless ready wheels that are great for breathing life into old bikes, repairs, or custom builds that won’t break the bank. Constructed with single-walled rims and stainless steel Sapim spokes, these wheels are ready to roll.

  • WTB ST i23 rims use 6061 aluminum and are light and strong
  • TCS 2.0 tubeless system rims come drilled for presta valves (not included)
  • Compatible with disc brakes that use center lock rotors
  • Freehub compatible with 10 and 11-speed drivetrains
  • Assembled in North America by experienced wheel builders with Sapim 14G stainless steel spokes and 14mm brass Polyax nipples
name: Wheel Shop WTB ST i23 700c Wheels
